name: Ribbon Racer
description: Ribbon Racer is a racing game, where cars can be upgraded during the race. In this game you can shoot to your opponents, use unique power-ups, making traps and much more!
minimum_requirements: OS: 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Celeron N3060 Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 550 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4200M Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GT 740M DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 550 MB available space
